objects.specification: A neutral-toned smooth textured floor panel with subtle matte finish, forming the base of the exhibition booth and providing a clean, uniform surface.
A tall neutral off-white smooth wall panel with minimal surface detail, providing a clean backdrop for branding and signage.
A tall neutral off-white smooth wall panel with minimal surface detail, forming the back wall and framing the entrance opening.
A tall neutral off-white smooth wall panel with minimal surface detail, enclosing the booth perimeter.

A sleek modern electric sedan with aerodynamic lines, glossy metallic paint, integrated LED headlights, tinted windows and realistic tire and rim details to showcase the vehicle at the center of the booth.
A contemporary reception desk with a curved front, warm wooden finish and polished surface, featuring integrated brochure holders on one side to welcome visitors.
A slender minimalistic display stand with a thin pedestal and horizontal shelf, finished in a vibrant color accent to draw attention and hold brochures or small products.
